content: Which film won the Academy Award for Best Picture in 2020?
Who played the character of Arthur Fleck in the 2019 film Joker?
In Stranger Things, what is the name of the small town where the show is set?
Which movie is the fourth installment of the Mission: Impossible series released in 2011?
In The Mandalorian, what is the name of the child traveling with the Mandalorian?
Which actor played the lead role in the movie Ford v Ferrari?
In The Queen's Gambit, what is Beth Harmon’s main talent?
What is the name of the time-bending film directed by Christopher Nolan that was released in 2020?
Which series features the character of Geralt of Rivia?
In The Boys, what is the name of the superhero group that the main characters oppose?
In the series Breaking Bad, what is the street name of the blue methamphetamine produced by Walter White?
In Blade Runner 2049 (2017), what is the name of the advanced AI hologram that Officer K is romantically involved with?
In the movie The Revenant (2015), what is the name of the mountain man who betrays and leaves Hugh Glass for dead?
Which film, directed by Denis Villeneuve, involves a linguist who tries to communicate with extraterrestrial beings?
In Game of Thrones, who does Arya Stark first add to her kill list after escaping King's Landing?
Which character does Mahershala Ali portray in the TV series True Detective (Season 3)?
In Get Out (2017), what is the name of the procedure used by the Armitage family to transfer the consciousness of their friends into other bodies?
In the John Wick series, what is the name of the hotel where assassins find refuge, overseen by the character Winston?
In The Haunting of Hill House, what color is the infamous room that holds traumatic secrets for each member of the Crain family?
In The Social Network (2010), what is the name of the co-founder who sues Mark Zuckerberg for diluting his shares in Facebook?
In Kill Bill, what is the code name of Uma Thurman’s character, also known as “The Bride”?
Which 2000s war movie starring Tom Hanks and directed by Steven Spielberg won the Academy Award for Best Cinematography?
Which 2006 film features Leonardo DiCaprio in a role as a diamond smuggler during a civil war in Sierra Leone?
In The Princess Bride, what is the name of the poison that Vizzni and Westley use during their battle of wits?
In No Country For Old Men (2007), what is the weapon of choice for the character Anton Chigurh?
In The Office (U.S.), what is the name of the company that buys out Dunder Miflin in the later seasons?
In Interstellar (2014), what is the name of the robot that assists Cooper and his crew on their mission?
In Avatar (2009), what is the name of the valuable mineral that humans are mining on Pandora?
In The Walking Dead, what is the name of the town that Rick and his group establish as their base of operations?
In Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince (2009), what potion does Professor Slughorn give to Harry as a reward for brewing the best potion in class?
In Inglourious Basterds (2009), what is the name of the German war hero whose premiere Shosanna plans to sabotage?
In The Legend of Korra, what is the name of the main antagonist of season 3 - 'Book Three: Change'?
